oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A description of some barter, containing allusion to the ill effect of eating Jackals hearts (L VIII.-16. 7456 rev.-7458 rev., 7460, note). |han=kass'o's maternal grandfather (Tsatsi) is given a dog by |gappem-ttu and it kills many jackals. Tsatsi gives a kaross to |gappem-ttu for giving him a dog that kills so many jackals.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Children do not eat jackal's hearts Notes (to )
